"Oh my my my. You are the Miko of this p: "Lisa has never shot at a Miko before. So so so, would you like to try it?"
"Hah... Another preposterous visitor."
"Hey, <%me>. Hath thee come for any reason of import, or art thou here simply to harass?"
"Stop that, Lisa! You are being impolite! I am terribly sorry. What Lisa said was unacceptable..."
"Thou picketh a fight, then turn about and offereth a heartfelt apology. What an absolute absurdity. Come, explaineth thyself."
"I see. Now I understand."
"But I have already imparted all that I can tell of the barrier to Xiao. Should thee not be left without unknowns?"
"I am afraid I must still ask. There may be some things better learned first-hand, rather than from a third party."
"In any case, I wish to play my part to my utmost capacity."
"Harriet's right on the mark. There's no room for overdoing things."
"Skimping on a simple visit and failing is not something Lisa would do."
"Goodness... such tribulations. Very well, I shall enlighten thee... But in return, a favor."
"Yes, whatever you desire."
"...Once this is all over, thou willt tell me of thy circumstances."
"Yes, a grand tea ceremony we shall hold. A relaxing affair as we look upon the flowers."
"Lisa doesn't care about tea. But she is very very interested in shooting a Miko."
"Hahah, thy other is unwavering. Then we shall look forward to it as entertainment."
"Wonderful, the Miko understands. Lisa can't wait. Hehe, ehehehehe."
"Sukuna-hime, you should not make such careless promises..."
"Lisa truly does intend to shoot at you..."
"Hahah! I am a Miko. Mistaketh me not for an easy target. Now what say thee to my request?"
"Surviveth this ordeal and returneth... And regaleth us with a story."
"...Very well. I accept your conditions."
"I will return... to participate in your tea ceremony."
"Good. Forgetteth not this promise."
"Don't ever ever forget your promise to be shot by Lisa either."
"Though Lisa will still shoot even if you do. Hehe. Hehehehe."
"Right so! ...So long as thou too remembereth to join us, shouldst thee survive."
"Very well, I shall teach thee of the barrier, beginning with the basics..."
